title: Bug: many times, Pixel 4 fails to show its content via USB
content:
I was told to report this here:
https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/172596238

No idea if reporting here can help.
Anyway, the issue is that many times the device won't allow Windows OS to show its storage, or won't allow a bit later.
And today I even saw the opposite, of showing it twice (and with different storage usage).

The workaround is to disconnect and re-connect, of course, but it's very annoying.
